game.name: DJ Life Simulator: From Your Bedroom to the Mainstage
game.shortDescription: Plug in a REAL USB DJ controller or Mouse/Keyboard and learn professional mixing techniques while playing! Rise through a career of epic gigs, and master skills you can use on real decks — the only game where fun truly turns you into a professional DJ.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Plug in a REAL USB DJ controller or Mouse/Keyboard and learn professional mixing techniques while playing! Rise through a career of epic gigs, and master skills you can use on real decks — the only game where fun truly turns you into a professional DJ.
